mapper.insert: insert into project_detail (id, video, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, content, images, others) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{images,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{others,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update project_detail set video = #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, images = #{images,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, others = #{others,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, video, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, content, images, others from project_detail where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, video, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, content, images, others from project_detail
